About the Company: Kwality Pharmaceuticals Ltd. (formerly Kwality Pharmaceuticals Pvt. Ltd.) is a pharmaceutical formation company. It is engaged in manufacturing finished pharmaceutical formulations in dosage form. The company manufacture and export pharmaceutical formulations in liquid orals, powder for oral suspension, tablets, capsules, sterile powder for injections, small volume injectables, ointments, external preparations in various categories like betalactum and non betalactum, harmones, cytotoxic (oncology) and effeverscent as per new gmp norms. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Amritsar, Punjab with an additional office in Kangra.
